original_text: So Jacob sent and called Rachel and Leah into the field where his flock was
korean_text: 야곱이 사람을 보내어 라헬과 레아를 자기 양 떼가 있는 들로 불러다가

sentences.original_text: So Jacob sent and called Rachel and Leah
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 야곱은 라헬과 레아를 보내 불렀다

sentences.original_text: into the field where his flock was
